GSD.product_version: versions from v3.19 to before v5.10.121
GSD.description:
drm/rockchip: vop: fix possible null-ptr-deref in vop_bind()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit 3451852312303d54a003c73bd0ae39cebb960bd5, it was introduced in version v3.19 by commit 2048e3286f347db5667708e47448176b5329e8d8. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/rockchip: vop: fix possible null-ptr-deref in vop_bind()
